attributes.additional_details: The NMW is what the government expect people to live on but the state pension is approximately half of the NMW, the government is contradicting itself if it is setting a minimum wage but expecting pensioners to live on half of that.
attributes.background: Start paying the state pension at the equivalent of the National Minimum Wage for an average working week (currently 37 hours)
